entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 8:51 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -29.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -33.0°C
Wind: E 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clear. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
